attributes.action: The Government should fund free TV licences for all over-75s.
attributes.additional_details: Many pensioners who do not recieve pension credit will strugle to pay for a TV licence. It is unfair to ask these pensioners to pay when the TV might be their only link to the world
attributes.background: Request that the BBC  stands up to it's commitment to all pensioners and re-introduces free licences for all pensioners.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
